name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.client.write.exclude.nodes.cache.expiry.interval.millis
description:
The maximum period to keep a DN in the excluded nodes list
  at a client. After this period, in milliseconds, the previously excluded node(s) will
  be removed automatically from the cache and will be considered good for block allocations
  again. Useful to lower or raise in situations where you keep a file open for very long
  periods (such as a Write-Ahead-Log (WAL) file) to make the writer tolerant to cluster maintenance
  restarts. Defaults to 10 minutes.

name: dfs.content-summary.sleep-microsec
description:
The length of time in microseconds to put the thread to sleep, between reaquiring the locks
    in content summary computation.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.timeout-ms
description:
Timeout value for fetcher to retry to fetch again when some
  non-fatal failure happens because of some events like NM restart.

name: fs.s3a.retry.throttle.limit
description: Number of times to retry any throttled request.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
description:
Maximum no of the skip levels to be maintained in the skip list for
    storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, it is set to 0 and a linear
    list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs.

name: ha.failover-controller.cli-check.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout that the CLI (manual) FC waits for monitorHealth, getServiceState
